customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
Just as the Eremites have many offshoots, the various Fatui operating beyond their borders also feature some units with more independent characteristics. One such group faced Aybak and his comrades in a battle, and he thought it to be the hardest fight he had ever experienced. In the end, no one walked away with what they had wanted...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When you trigger Cryo-related Reactions, they will deal +2 DMG. The first time each of your characters uses a Skill or equips a Talent per Round, spend 1 less Elemental Die.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Mirror Maiden
customize.desc:
"Snezhnayan Maiden" Mirror Enovy

All secrets shall be concealed within the mirror of glaring brightnessâ€¦

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
